description:
Ride in the rain with peace of mind, knowing your gear will remain dry. The Monsoon Onceanweave pannier is highly waterproof and spacious, with two internal removable internal organizers, two large compartments, and plenty of reflective elements and light attachments to ensure you stay visible. Easy on-off hardware is a breeze to use when coming or going.

  • Polyurethane-coated Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Hydracore® liner provides IPX5 waterproofness
  • Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape
  • Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm
  • Separate compression straps for main compartment and outer compartment let you fine-tune the load distribution
  • Removeable padded laptop sleeve and removeable padded tablet sleeve both have pockets for organization
  • Daisy chain loops provide attachments for extra gear
  • Reflective accents and light loops on both sides
  • Webbing carry handles
name: Axiom Monsoon Oceanweave P23+ Urban Pannier
